Meteor.GameEngine.Interfaces

Interface Updatable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Level, Mob, Object, ObjectManager, Tile, TiledLevel

    public interface Updatable
    Updatable is the main game engine's update interface class.
    This class is used to force other classes implementing Updatable to implement its methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(Manager manager, double delta)
      The required update() method for the Meteor object.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(Manager manager,
            double delta)
        The required update() method for the Meteor object. Updates the game based on the back-end game clock.
        Parameters:
        manager - The engine manager object.
        delta - Time elapsed between each frame.
